Package index

All functions

Backward()
Propagate a backward table
CacheHaplotypes()
Load haplotypes into optimised package cache
CacheSummary() N() L()
Retrieve information about the haplotype cache
CalcCheckpointTables()
Calculate Checkpoint Tables
CalcRho()
Calculate recombination probabilities
CalcTraces()
Fast Calculation of Matrix Trace and Hilbert Schmidt Norm
CladeMat()
Fast clade matrix construction
ClearHaplotypeCache()
Remove all cached haplotypes and free memory
CopyTable()
Copy Forward/Backward tables
CreateForwardTableCache()
Create cache for forward tables
DistMat()
Distance matrix
FillTableCache()
Fill a forward table cache
Forward()
Propagate a forward table
ForwardIterator()
Build an efficient iterator over loci
ForwardUsingTableCache()
Use a forward table cache to propagate
MakeBackwardTable()
Create a kalisBackwardTable
MakeForwardTable()
Create a kalisForwardTable
Parameters()
Define a set of Li and Stephens parameters
PostProbs()
Posterior marginal probabilities
PruneCladeMat()
Prune called sprigs or singletons from inferred clade matrix
QueryCache()
Retrieve haplotypes from memory cache
ResetTable()
Reset Forward/Backward tables
SmallHaps SmallMap
Small example phased haplotype dataset and recombination map
Sprigs()
Greedy sprig calling based on nearest neighbourhoods
WriteHaplotypes() ReadHaplotypes()
I/O for haplotype matrices in HDF5 files
plot(<kalisDistanceMatrix>)
Plotting function for a distance matrix
